name: MLStyleTransfer.ModelParameters
desc: Parameters that affect the training process of a style transfer model.

items.name: init(algorithm: MLStyleTransfer.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType, validation: MLStyleTransfer.ModelParameters.ValidationData, maxIterations: Int, textelDensity: Int, styleStrength: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new set of training parameters for a style transfer model.

items.name: var algorithm: MLStyleTransfer.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType
items.desc: The style transfer task’s training algorithm that prioritizes either speed or quality.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the style transfer model parameters that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the style transfer model parameters.

items.name: var maxIterations: Int
items.desc: The largest number of iterations the style transfer model can use during training.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the style transfer model parameters shown in a playground.

items.name: var styleStrength: Int
items.desc: The amount of influence the input style image has in the stylized image output.

items.name: var textelDensity: Int
items.desc: The amount of detail the task applies from the input style image to the stylized image output.

items.name: var validation: MLStyleTransfer.ModelParameters.ValidationData
items.desc: The style transfer model’s validation dataset.

items.name: enum MLStyleTransfer.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType
items.desc: The style transfer training algorithm options.

items.name: enum MLStyleTransfer.ModelParameters.ValidationData
items.desc: The source of a validation dataset for a style transfer model.
